column5: Yes it is a scam. We are fuckin sea monkeys at best. Forced at early ages to become slaves to hormones forcing you to have sex and make other miserable people in a horrible unfair fucked up world. Able to be parents at 12 !! That’s so fucked up. If you knew at 12 what you now know at 35 you would never have messed with that guy or girl. But those fuckin hormones control your sea monkey ass. And what’s it all for? To get old and sick become a burden to others then die a miserable lonely sick assdeath. Fuck this shit.
